00109 class POPTMX_API Err{
00110 
00111 public:
00113   enum ErrTp {
00114         WARN,                        
00115         ERR,                         
00116         FATAL                        
00117   } ;
00118 
00119 private:
00120   std::string message;               
00121   std::string module;                
00122   ErrTp terr;           
00123 
00124 public:
00125 
00127   Err(ErrTp _terr, const std::string & mod, const std::string & msg);
00128   void report() const ;                 
00129 
00130 };
00131 
00132 
00138 static inline void
00139 throw_error(const std::string & mod, const std::string & msg){
00140   Err err(Err::ERR, mod, msg);
00141   err.report();
00142   throw err;
00143 }
00144 
00152 static inline Err
00153 warn(const std::string & mod, const std::string & msg){
00154   Err err(Err::WARN, mod, msg);
00155   err.report();
00156   return err;
00157 }

00164 typedef enum {
00165   OPTION,                                               
00166   ARGUMENT,                                             
00167   NOTE,                                                 
00168   MAN,                                                  
00169   // ALIAS,                                             //< Alias to the option(s)
00170   PROC                                                  
00171 } Kind;

00450 
00460 template<class BClass> inline int
00461 conversion(void* _val, const std::string & in){
00462   return _conversion( (BClass *) _val, in);
00463 }
00464 
00465 
00477 template<class BClass> inline OptionTable &
00478 OptionTable::add( Kind _kind,   BClass * _val,
00479                                   const char _char_name, const std::string & _long_name,
00480                                   const std::string & _short_desc, const std::string & _long_desc, const std::string & _dflt){
00481   if ( _kind != poptmx::OPTION )
00482         throw_error("add option", "You've got the wrong add function for your kind.");
00483   return add(_kind, _val, conversion<BClass>, _char_name, _long_name,
00484                          _short_desc, _long_desc, type_desc(_val), _dflt, false );
00485 }
00486 
00497 template<class BClass> inline OptionTable &
00498 OptionTable::add( Kind _kind, BClass * _val,
00499                                   const std::string & _long_name,
00500                                   const std::string & _short_desc, const std::string & _long_desc, const std::string & _dflt){
00501   if ( _kind != poptmx::ARGUMENT )
00502         throw_error("add argument", "You've got the wrong add function for your kind.");
00503   return add(_kind, _val, conversion<BClass>, 0, _long_name,
00504                          _short_desc, _long_desc, type_desc(_val), _dflt, false );
00505 }
00506 
00507 
00508 
00509 
00510 
00521 template<class BClass> inline int
00522 arr_conversion(void* _val, const std::string & in){
00523   BClass var;
00524   int returned = conversion<BClass>(&var, in);
00525   if (returned >= 0)
00526         ( (std::vector<BClass> *) _val ) ->push_back(var);
00527   return returned;
00528 }
00529 
00530 
00542 template<class BClass> inline OptionTable &
00543 OptionTable::add( Kind _kind, std::vector<BClass> * _val,
00544                                   const char _char_name, const std::string & _long_name,
00545                                   const std::string & _short_desc, const std::string & _long_desc, const std::string & _dflt){
00546   if ( _kind != OPTION )
00547         throw_error("add option", "You've got the wrong add function for your kind.");
00548   BClass var;
00549   return add(_kind, _val, arr_conversion<BClass>, _char_name, _long_name,
00550                          _short_desc, _long_desc, type_desc(& var)+"...", _dflt, true);
00551 }
00552 
00563 template<class BClass> inline OptionTable &
00564 OptionTable::add( Kind _kind, std::vector<BClass> * _val,
00565                                   const std::string & _long_name,
00566                                   const std::string & _short_desc, const std::string & _long_desc, const std::string & _dflt){
00567   if ( _kind != ARGUMENT )
00568         throw_error("add argument", "You've got the wrong add function for your kind.");
00569   BClass var;
00570   return add( _kind, _val, arr_conversion<BClass>, 0, _long_name,
00571                           _short_desc, _long_desc, type_desc(&var)+"...", _dflt, true);
00572 }
